title: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character in the first line is replaced with spaces so that the two lines are indented the same visually, executing a ShiftLeft operation should shift the text to the left. However, in the current scenario, the second line is not shifted left and it is unclear why the text won't shift. Additionally, in the first scenario, it seems like the first line should also be shifted left at least until the space character (i.e., remove the tab). It is confusing if there is a stray space present.
SR:
1. Open the affected file in the editor.
2. Replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that the two lines are indented the same visually.
3. Perform a ShiftLeft operation on the selected text.
4. Verify that the second line is shifted left and the first line is also shifted left until the space character (removing the tab).
